title: Culver City
name: Kay & Dave's
directions: downtown Culver City across from the Ince Parking Structure
content: Tasty fresh Mex food made without lard or trans fats. The vibe is easy-going with plenty of outdoor seating (including a firepit) and a friendly, slightly quirky staff. Happy hour specials include 2-for-one margaritas and appetizer specials.
